mapper.select: select buddy_country from buddy_country where buddy_num in (select buddy_num from buddy where mem_id='test' and buddy_state=0)
select buddy_city from buddy_city where country_num in (select country_num from buddy_country where buddy_num=(select buddy_num from buddy where mem_id='test' and buddy_state=0))
select distinct buddy_country from buddy_country c, buddy b where b.buddy_state=0
select distinct buddy_city from buddy b, buddy_city t, buddy_country c where c.country_num=t.country_num and b.buddy_state=0 and c.buddy_country=#{country}
